name: Wing Kwan LI
slogan: Life is a process of debugging, the more you hate the stronger you are
tips: Press ctrl + p to print this resume

content: Hey, I am a software engineer with over 4 years of experience in building scalable, cross-region SaaS. Expertise lies in designing and implementing a full-stack serverless solutions from scratch, as well as crafting intuitive web applications and mobile applications. Proficient in UI/UX design, ensuring seamless user experiences across different platforms. Passionate about uncovering innovative solutions to complex problems and actively contributing to the open-source community. Proven ability to adapt to new technologies and work effectively within multidisciplinary teams.

project.title: Software Engineer
project.description: Full-time Software Engineer at Appcider Limited, specializing in developing UI/UX and backend for ShipAny, a cross-border logistics platform. I have successfully designed and developed a serverless solution that has enabled the product to serve over 4,000 merchants in Hong Kong. Achieved a significant increase in user engagement due to the improved product UI/UX

tips.title: My works
content: Lead the development of upstream eCommerce applications for Shopify  and  EasyStore
Lead the design and development of a live sales channel in Thailand region.
Played a crucial role in the core development of the ShipAny web portal
API integration with domestic and international Logistics Couriers System
Integration with payment gateways: Stripe, Payment Asia, Checkout.com
Designed and developed internal mobile applications for drivers on Android and iOS platforms, automating logistic tracking status updates
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs, facilitating seamless communication between external parties and our system.
Provided daily field issue support for Hong Kong and Taiwan merchants, resolving issues promptly and effectively.

project.description: Contributed to the bug fix of the React Native UI library, td-design, a comprehensive design system for building enterprise-level mobile applications.
Contributed the bug fix of the open sourced CLI tool, safaribooks, a tool to download and generate EPUB books from O'Reilly Learning (aka Safari Books Online)

tips.title: Contributions & Works
content: Conduct an in-depth analysis of the SSL pinning mechanism in the O'Reilly Learning mobile app.
Perform a comprehensive examination of the anti-debugging mechanism used by the O'Reilly Learning mobile app.
Engage in reverse engineering to the O'Reilly Learning mobile app login API.

project.title: Stock management mobile app
project.description: A simple stock management mobile app for a chain of hardware stores.

tips.title: My works
content: Collecting requirements from customer and design the UI/UX prototype.
Develop backend restful api for mobile app use.
Click here to check the mobile app

project.title: Desktop Stock management Tool
project.description: Development of stock management tool dashboard

tips.title: My works
content: Prepare documentations which include UML diagrams.

project.description: All-in-one progressive web app for anime enthusiast to read light novel, manga and watch TV animation.

tips.title: Everything is built from scratch
content: Develop distributed web scraping service from various websites & apps.
Integrate external non-consistent raw data from multiple sources into standard JSON schema.
Develop restful apis for frontend use.
Design and implement ebook conversion algorithms to convert horizontal text layout Chinese txt, mobi, azw3, epub to Traditional Chinese ebook with vertical text layout.
Build a load-test framework, scaled cloud service provider automatically and simulate concurrent connections.
Develop in-app send to kindle ebook reader service.
Design and Develop mobile progressive web app interface.
